# Optimization Module

Optimization algorithm and reinforcement learning integration interfaces.

## Optimization Interface

Base interfaces for simulation-optimization.

```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: simcraft.optimization.base.ObjectiveType
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

```{eval-rst}

   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

```{eval-rst}
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: simcraft.optimization.base.EvaluationResult
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: simcraft.optimization.base.OptimizationInterface
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

```{eval-rst}
.. autoclass:: simcraft.optimization.base.SimulationExperiment
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```

## Reinforcement Learning Interface

Gym-compatible environment wrapper for RL integration.

```{eval-rst}
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
```
